title: Puso Ni Comi
alternative_title: Phantasy Star Online 2 Comic, ぷそ煮コミ
description: An anime adaptation of Sega's Phantasy Star Online 2 game's official web manga Puso Ni Comi: Phantasy Star Online 2 Comic. The story follows the lax, less than weighty daily life of the ARKS force members.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Game>, <Genre -> Parody>, <Genre -> School>, <Genre -> Sci-Fi>]
